name: Hot Diggity (Ludum Dare 29)
description:
Dig down, dig deep! An enormous cosmic horror is devouring the planet and the only safest way is down! Drill and laser your way through ore fields and explosive magma rocks, and upgrade your ship with extra bits as you go!

Came 3rd overall in Ludum Dare 29 and was rated #1 in the Fun category.
